Package org.jcatapult.security.servlet

Interface Summary
CredentialStorage This class provides a mechanism for locating user credentials within a Servlet container.
 

Class Summary
CredentialStorageWorkflow This class provides a simple mechanism for locating an existing user object using the CredentialStorage and then storing it into the JCatapultSecurityContextProvider, which is the default implementation of the EnhancedSecurityContextProvider.
FacadeHttpServletRequest This class allows the URI to be completely changed, including support for forwards and includes from a RequestDispatcher.
FacadeHttpServletRequest.FacadeRequestDispatcher  
HttpSessionCredentialStorage This class provides a persistent storage location within the HTTP session for user credentials.
JCatapultSecurityContextProvider This class implements the SecurityContextProvider using the JCatapult security framework.
RememberMeWorkflow This class implements a simple remember me service that if activated will load the users information from a persistent cookie.
SecurityWorkflow This class is the main security workflow that attaches to the JCatapult Workflow system and provides the functionality for handling all the JCatapult security needs.
SecurityWorkflowResolver This class extends the DefaultWorkflowResolver in order to add the SecurityWorkflow to the front of the chain.
ServletTools This is a toolkit for common servlet methods.
